segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying her plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the window nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden beyond looks serene with its bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink faucet is left running unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water is drenching the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle widens on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy climbs the stool unsteadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's posture shows she's part of the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand up, waiting for her cookie reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
